column1: Local Foods////Local foods serves up great salads and sandwiches.  They'll make any sandwich into a salad which I think is pretty cool.  The food is fresh and consistent
column2: every bite leaves you wanting more.  It's counter service
column3: you order it and they'll bring it to you.  The decor is modern and clean.  I recommend the crunchy chicken sandwich.  The pricing is fair for the quality of food you're getting.
